Crate rerun::external::re_viewport

Expand description

Rerun Viewport Panel

This crate provides the central panel that contains all space views.

Modules

  • blueprint
    Auto-generated blueprint-related types.
  • external
  • space_view_heuristics

Structs

    The native version of a crate::blueprint::archetypes::ContainerBlueprint.

    Defines the layout of the Viewport
  • ViewportBlueprint
    Describes the layout and contents of the Viewport Panel.
  • ViewportState
    State for the Viewport that persists across frames but otherwise is not saved.

    Controls how context_menu_ui_for_item should handle the current selection state.
